reference.title: Issues with Formatting
reference.shortdesc: In addition to making sure you include the necessary information in your resume, you also need to make sure that the formatting is adequate..

section.title: Spacing and Number of Pages
section.p: In some cases, you might end up spilling over from one page to two pages by just a couple of lines. Try the following approaches to resolve the problem:

ol.li: Decrease the size of the margins.

section.title: Bullet Point Issues
section.p: After adding bullet points to your experience section, you may find that certain words from each bullet point spill over to the next line, creating unnecessary white space in your resume.
When this happens, try to either shorten the sentences within the bullet points by rephrasing them, or refer to te spacing steps above.
